Hymn.English: 8 Let the hills be joyful together before the Lord

Hymn.Arabic: لأَنَّهُ أَتَى لِبَدِينَ الْأَرْضَ ، يَدِينُ الْمَسْكُونَةَ بالْعَدْلِ ، وَالسُّعُوبَ بِالاسْتِقَامَةِ هَلِلُويَا
Hymn.English: 9 For He is coming to judge the earth. With righteousness He shall judge the world, And the peoples with equity.     Alleluia
